name: Deity U Art Project
description:
You just plonk down objects on a planet. Not much else to it, you've got 60 seconds why are you reading this you're running out of time. If only you hadn't stayed up so late partying last night you would've had all morning today to get this done but now it's 4 in the afternoon and you're about to have to retake this class. I'd wish you good luck, but I don't think that'd help. For the record I don't think a miracle would help you either, which is a shame, given the setting.

I used sound effects from opengameart:

Bubble pop - here

Zippo click - here
